p: Rosin-modified room-temperature-vulcanized silicone rubber can be prepared from rosin glycidyl ester, aminopropyltrietoxysilane, tetraetoxysilane and hydroxyl-terminated polydimetoxysilane according to Scheme 72 [ 254]. Rosin-modified silicones shows significantly better thermal and mechanical properties in comparison with unmodified silicone [ 254, 255, 256].
